main_definition: The act of bringing something to an end or the formal process of ending a contract, employment, relationship, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: After completing the research, the team sought termination and closure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of ending an employment contract
meanings_and_examples.example: She received notice that her position would be terminated due to company downsizing.
They mutually decided to terminate their friendship after years of disagreements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The formal process ending an agreement, like contract termination
meanings_and_examples.example: The court granted the termination of the lease due to unpaid rent by the tenant.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Dismissal or firing from a job
meanings_and_examples.example: Unfortunately, he faced termination after failing to meet his sales targets.
